articles.description: While Abba perform as avatars, the Stones are absolutely the real deal, performing with the energy of a band several decades younger
articles.content: Mick Jagger recently said rocknroll isnt supposed to be done in your 70s, but he seems determined to prove this wrong. While Abba have returned as digital avatars of their young selves, the Stones fr… [+2747 chars]
